arts.ttl: Marco Baroni Urges Lazio to Stay Focused Ahead of Tricky Europa League Clash
arts.sum: Lazio manager Marco Baroni has urged his side not to take upcoming UEFA Europa League rivals Twente lightly. The Biancocelesti will take on the Eredivisie side at De Grolsch Veste later tonight, seeking redemption for a narrow 1-0 Serie A defeat at Juventus last weekend.
